| HistoryText             = The '''New York Giants''' are a professional American football team based in the New York metropolitan area. The Giants compete in the NFL (National Football League). The team plays its home games at [[MetLife Stadium]] in [[East Rutherford]], [[New Jersey (State)|New Jersey]]. 

[[File:Fat_Cobra_(Earth-616)_from_Immortal_Weapons_Vol_1_1_0005.jpg|left|thumb]]
In the mid 20th century; [[Fat Cobra (Earth-616)|Fat Cobra]] played defensive end for the Giants for two seasons until the league kicked him out for seriously wounding several protesters from the [[Ku Klux Klan (Earth-616)|Ku Klux Klan]].{{r|Immortal Weapons Vol 1 1}}
